text: The 2018 season was KA's second season back in top tier football in Iceland following their relegation in 2004. This was their 17th season in the top flight of Icelandic football. KA finished the previous season in 7th place. == Squad == (captain) === Out on loan === == Transfers == === Winter === In: Out: === Summer === In: Out: == Competitions == === Table === == References == == External links == * Category:Knattspyrnufélag Akureyrar Category:Knattspyrnufélag Akureyrar seasons Category:Icelandic football club seasons Knat
title: 2018 Knattspyrnufélag Akureyrar season
